name.value: <string value - Azure Web App for Container>

location.value: <string value - Region name of Azure Web App for Container>

serverFarmResourceGroup.value: <string value - Resource Group of Azure App Service Plan>

webSitesResourceGroup.value: <string value - Resource Group of Azure Web App for Container>

azureCliServicePrincipalId.value: <string value - Azure AD App Service Principal ID for Azure CLI>

azureCliServicePrincipalTenantId.value: <string value - Azure AD Tenant ID for Azure CLI>

letsencryptEmail.value: <string value - E-mail address used in Let's Encrypt>
